content:
Connect frontline agents, back-office teams, and customers with flexible components that support policy administration, benefit administration, claims, and billing. Use highly configurable tools in Insurance to tailor the end-to-end processes vital to the strength of your business.

The platform puts customers and users at the center of each interaction, enabling personalized service and timely product innovations in an ever-evolving marketplace.

New to Insurance? See Get Started with Insurance.

Ready to roll up your sleeves and get certified on the Digital Insurance Platform? See the Digital Insurance Consultant or Digital Insurance Developer customer learning journey.

The Digital Insurance Platform is built on top of Salesforce and provides components for policy administration, benefit administration, claims, and billing systems used by the insurance industry vertical.

Want to get a jump on configuring Insurance to rate, quote, and sell insurance products, and administer sold policies? The Application Suite offers examples of fully built applications that can guide you as you plan your own implementations.

Permission set licenses extend the functionality of user licenses. With permission set licenses, you can assign more permissions to users than what their user license supports.

The Salesforce data model is the Digital Insurance Platform of choice. If you use the Vlocity package data model, the process of switching to the Salesforce data model is called harmonization. It involves using new objects and services that integrate seamlessly into the Salesforce Customer 360 platform.

An insurance product model is a structured definition of a product that a company sells, then services. A product model acts as a blueprint for an insurance product.

Rating procedures make it possible to price insurance products. Set up, map, and implement rating procedures for all your products and plans.

Insurance issues policies from quotes. Think of a quote as the foundation on which you build the policy. Create a quote by selecting products offered by the provider and using information supplied by the customer to calculate the estimate.

You can track commissions for agents and insurance products, and gain insight into commissions associated with each stage of the customer journey.

Starting with the Winter '20 release, we've created a read-only Policy page built using Salesforce Lightning web component technology. Insurance uses custom Lightning web components to display information stored in the Policy (Asset) object.

Use Claims Management for Insurance to design modern and efficient experiences for all parties involved in the claims process, from claimants to claims adjusters to claim supervisors.

Group benefits are insurance plans offered to and covering a group of people, such as employees and their dependents. Manage these insurance offerings in a rapidly evolving marketplace with Group Benefits on the Digital Insurance Platform.

Explore the services catalog, Apex triggers, UI templates, and more.
title: Salesforce Insurance Platform Overview
